formulaFunctions.name: ABS
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the absolute value of a number, a number without its sign
formulaFunctions.label: ABS

formulaFunctions.name: ACOS
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the arc cosine of the number in radians, if the given number is between -1 and 1.  Otherwise NULL.
formulaFunctions.label: ACOS

formulaFunctions.name: ADDMONTHS
formulaFunctions.description: Add the num months to the date, using the last date of the month if date is the last day of the month or adding num months has fewer days.
formulaFunctions.label: ADDMONTHS

formulaFunctions.name: AND
formulaFunctions.description: Checks whether all arguments are true and returns TRUE if all arguments are true
formulaFunctions.label: AND

formulaFunctions.name: ASCII
formulaFunctions.description: Return the first character's code point from the given string as a number.
formulaFunctions.label: ASCII

formulaFunctions.name: ASIN
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the arc sine of the number in radians, if the given number is between -1 and 1.  Otherwise NULL.
formulaFunctions.label: ASIN

formulaFunctions.name: ATAN
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the arc tangent of the number in radians.
formulaFunctions.label: ATAN

formulaFunctions.name: ATAN2
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the arc tangent of the quotient of y and x in radians.
formulaFunctions.label: ATAN2

formulaFunctions.name: BEGINS
formulaFunctions.description: Checks if text begins with specified characters and returns TRUE if it does. Otherwise returns FALSE
formulaFunctions.label: BEGINS

formulaFunctions.name: BLANKVALUE
formulaFunctions.description: Checks whether expression is blank and returns substitute_expression if it is blank. If expression is not blank, returns the original expression value.
formulaFunctions.label: BLANKVALUE

formulaFunctions.name: BR
formulaFunctions.description: Inserts an HTML break tag in string formulas
formulaFunctions.label: BR

formulaFunctions.name: CASE
formulaFunctions.description: Checks an expression against a series of values.Â  If the expression compares equal to any value, the corresponding result is returned. If it is not equal to any of the values, the else-result is returned
formulaFunctions.label: CASE

formulaFunctions.name: CASESAFEID
formulaFunctions.description: Converts a 15-character ID into a case insensitive 18-character ID
formulaFunctions.label: CASESAFEID

formulaFunctions.name: CEILING
formulaFunctions.description: Rounds a number up to the nearest integer, away from zero if negative
formulaFunctions.label: CEILING

formulaFunctions.name: CHR
formulaFunctions.description: Return a string with the first character's code point as the given number.
formulaFunctions.label: CHR

formulaFunctions.name: CONTAINS
formulaFunctions.description: Checks if text contains specified characters, and returns TRUE if it does.  Otherwise, returns FALSE
formulaFunctions.label: CONTAINS

formulaFunctions.name: COS
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the cosine of the number, where the number given in radians
formulaFunctions.label: COS

formulaFunctions.name: CURRENCYRATE
formulaFunctions.description: Return the conversion rate to the corporate currency for the given CurrencyIsoCode, or 1.0 if the currency is invalid.
formulaFunctions.label: CURRENCYRATE

formulaFunctions.name: DATE
formulaFunctions.description: Creates a date from a year, month and day
formulaFunctions.label: DATE

formulaFunctions.name: DATETIMEVALUE
formulaFunctions.description: Returns a year, month, day and GMT time value
formulaFunctions.label: DATETIMEVALUE

formulaFunctions.name: DATEVALUE
formulaFunctions.description: Creates a date from its datetime or text representation
formulaFunctions.label: DATEVALUE

formulaFunctions.name: DAY
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the day of the month, a number between 1 and 31
formulaFunctions.label: DAY

formulaFunctions.name: DAYOFYEAR
formulaFunctions.description: Return the day of the calendar year (from 1-366).
formulaFunctions.label: DAYOFYEAR

formulaFunctions.name: DISTANCE
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the distance between two locations using the provided unit.
formulaFunctions.label: DISTANCE

formulaFunctions.name: EXP
formulaFunctions.description: Returns e raised to the power of a given number
formulaFunctions.label: EXP

formulaFunctions.name: FIND
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the position of the search_text string in text
formulaFunctions.label: FIND

formulaFunctions.name: FLOOR
formulaFunctions.description: Rounds a number down, towards zero to the nearest integer
formulaFunctions.label: FLOOR

formulaFunctions.name: FORMATDURATION
formulaFunctions.description: Format the number of seconds with optional days, or the difference between times or dateTimes as HH:MI:SS.
formulaFunctions.label: FORMATDURATION

formulaFunctions.name: FROMUNIXTIME
formulaFunctions.description: Return the datetime that represents the given number as the seconds elapsed since 1 Jan 1970.
formulaFunctions.label: FROMUNIXTIME

formulaFunctions.name: GEOLOCATION
formulaFunctions.description: Returns a location based on the provided latitude and longitude.
formulaFunctions.label: GEOLOCATION

formulaFunctions.name: GETSESSIONID
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the current session ID. This may be useful in hyperlinks to other applications that use salesforce.com credentials for authentication
formulaFunctions.label: GETSESSIONID

formulaFunctions.name: HTMLENCODE
formulaFunctions.description: Encodes text and merge field values for use in HTML
formulaFunctions.label: HTMLENCODE

formulaFunctions.name: HYPERLINK
formulaFunctions.description: Creates a hyperlink
formulaFunctions.label: HYPERLINK

formulaFunctions.name: IF
formulaFunctions.description: Checks whether a condition is true, and returns one value if TRUE and another value if FALSE.
formulaFunctions.label: IF

formulaFunctions.name: INCLUDES
formulaFunctions.description: Determines if any value selected in a multi-select picklist field equals a text literal you specify.
formulaFunctions.label: INCLUDES

formulaFunctions.name: INITCAP
formulaFunctions.description: Return the text as lowercase with first character of each word made uppercase.
formulaFunctions.label: INITCAP

formulaFunctions.name: ISBLANK
formulaFunctions.description: Checks whether an expression is blank and returns TRUE or FALSE
formulaFunctions.label: ISBLANK

formulaFunctions.name: ISNULL
formulaFunctions.description: Checks whether an expression is null and returns TRUE or FALSE
formulaFunctions.label: ISNULL

formulaFunctions.name: ISNUMBER
formulaFunctions.description: Returns TRUE if the text value is a number. Otherwise, it returns FALSE.
formulaFunctions.label: ISNUMBER

formulaFunctions.name: ISOWEEK
formulaFunctions.description: Return the ISO 8601 week number for the given date (from 1-53) so that the first week starts on monday.
formulaFunctions.label: ISOWEEK

formulaFunctions.name: ISOYEAR
formulaFunctions.description: Return the ISO 8601 week-numbering 4-digit year for the given date so that the first day is a monday.
formulaFunctions.label: ISOYEAR

formulaFunctions.name: ISPICKVAL
formulaFunctions.description: Checks whether the value of a picklist field is equal to a string literal
formulaFunctions.label: ISPICKVAL

formulaFunctions.name: JSENCODE
formulaFunctions.description: Encodes text and merge field values for use in JavaScript
formulaFunctions.label: JSENCODE

formulaFunctions.name: JSINHTMLENCODE
formulaFunctions.description: Encodes text and merge field values for use in JavaScript within HTML tags
formulaFunctions.label: JSINHTMLENCODE

formulaFunctions.name: LEFT
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the specified number of characters from the start of a text string
formulaFunctions.label: LEFT

formulaFunctions.name: LEN
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the number of characters in a text string
formulaFunctions.label: LEN

formulaFunctions.name: LINKTO
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the HTML link element for the selected target with optional inputs expressed as query parameters
formulaFunctions.label: LINKTO

formulaFunctions.name: LN
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the natural logarithm of a number
formulaFunctions.label: LN

formulaFunctions.name: LOG
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the base 10 logarithm of n
formulaFunctions.label: LOG

formulaFunctions.name: LOWER
formulaFunctions.description: Converts all letters in the value to lowercase
formulaFunctions.label: LOWER

formulaFunctions.name: LPAD
formulaFunctions.description: Pad the left side of the value with spaces or the optional pad string so that the length is padded_length
formulaFunctions.label: LPAD

formulaFunctions.name: MAX
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the greatest of all the arguments
formulaFunctions.label: MAX

formulaFunctions.name: MCEILING
formulaFunctions.description: Rounds a number up to the nearest integer, towards zero if negative
formulaFunctions.label: MCEILING

formulaFunctions.name: MFLOOR
formulaFunctions.description: Rounds a number down to the nearest integer, away from zero if negative
formulaFunctions.label: MFLOOR

formulaFunctions.name: MID
formulaFunctions.description: Returns character from the middle of a text string, given a starting position and length
formulaFunctions.label: MID

formulaFunctions.name: MIN
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the least of all the arguments
formulaFunctions.label: MIN

formulaFunctions.name: MOD
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the remainder after a number is divided by a divisor
formulaFunctions.label: MOD

formulaFunctions.name: MONTH
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the month, a number between 1 (January) and 12 (December)
formulaFunctions.label: MONTH

formulaFunctions.name: NOT
formulaFunctions.description: Changes FALSE to TRUE or TRUE to FALSE
formulaFunctions.label: NOT

formulaFunctions.name: NOW
formulaFunctions.description: Returns a datetime representing the current moment
formulaFunctions.label: NOW

formulaFunctions.name: NULLVALUE
formulaFunctions.description: Checks whether expression is null and returns substitute_expression if it is null. If expression is not null, returns the original expression value.
formulaFunctions.label: NULLVALUE

formulaFunctions.name: OR
formulaFunctions.description: Checks whether any of the arguments are true and returns TRUE or FALSE.  Returns FALSE only if all arguments are false
formulaFunctions.label: OR

formulaFunctions.name: PI
formulaFunctions.description: Returns pi
formulaFunctions.label: PI

formulaFunctions.name: PICKLISTCOUNT
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the number of selected values in a multi-select picklist.
formulaFunctions.label: PICKLISTCOUNT

formulaFunctions.name: REGEX
formulaFunctions.description: Returns TRUE if Text matches the regular expression RegEx_Text. Otherwise, it returns FALSE.
formulaFunctions.label: REGEX

formulaFunctions.name: RIGHT
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the specified number of characters from the end of a text string
formulaFunctions.label: RIGHT

formulaFunctions.name: ROUND
formulaFunctions.description: Rounds a number to a specified number of digits
formulaFunctions.label: ROUND

formulaFunctions.name: RPAD
formulaFunctions.description: Pad the right side of the value with spaces or the optional pad string so that the length is padded_length
formulaFunctions.label: RPAD

formulaFunctions.name: SIN
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the sine of the number, where the number given in radians
formulaFunctions.label: SIN

formulaFunctions.name: SQRT
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the positive square root of a number
formulaFunctions.label: SQRT

formulaFunctions.name: SUBSTITUTE
formulaFunctions.description: Substitutes new_text for old_text in a text string. Use SUBSTITUTE when you want to replace specific text in a text string
formulaFunctions.label: SUBSTITUTE

formulaFunctions.name: TAN
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the tangent of the number, where the number given in radians
formulaFunctions.label: TAN

formulaFunctions.name: TEXT
formulaFunctions.description: Converts a value to text using standard display format
formulaFunctions.label: TEXT

formulaFunctions.name: TODAY
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the current date
formulaFunctions.label: TODAY

formulaFunctions.name: TRIM
formulaFunctions.description: Removes all spaces from a text string except for single spaces between words
formulaFunctions.label: TRIM

formulaFunctions.name: TRUNC
formulaFunctions.description: Truncates a number to a specified number of digits
formulaFunctions.label: TRUNC

formulaFunctions.name: UNIXTIMESTAMP
formulaFunctions.description: Return the number of seconds since 1 Jan 1970 for the given date, or number of seconds in the day for a time.
formulaFunctions.label: UNIXTIMESTAMP

formulaFunctions.name: UPPER
formulaFunctions.description: Converts all letters in the value to uppercase
formulaFunctions.label: UPPER

formulaFunctions.name: URLENCODE
formulaFunctions.description: Encodes text and merge field values for use in URLs
formulaFunctions.label: URLENCODE

formulaFunctions.name: URLFOR
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the url for the selected target with optional inputs expressed as query parameters
formulaFunctions.label: URLFOR

formulaFunctions.name: VALUE
formulaFunctions.description: Converts a text string that represents a number to a number
formulaFunctions.label: VALUE

formulaFunctions.name: WEEKDAY
formulaFunctions.description: Return the day of the week for the given date, using 1 for Sunday, 2 for Monday, through 7 for Saturday.
formulaFunctions.label: WEEKDAY

formulaFunctions.name: YEAR
formulaFunctions.description: Returns the year of a date, a number between 1900 and 9999
formulaFunctions.label: YEAR
